mapper.insert: insert into vod_phone_albuminfovideo (id,seriesCode,drama,dramaname,dramaviewPoint,Resolution,Definition,SourceType, Type,duration,priority,Injectiontime,pic,title,description, zxdispatchurl,zxversionlist,zxfileurl,zxmovieUrl,zxversion, hwversionlist,hwversion,hwmovieUrl,hwfileurl,isShow,create_time,create_user ,hwdispatchurl,dramasequence,isCollectfees,collectfeesbag) values (CONCAT(unix_timestamp(now()),cast( floor(rand()*100000) as SIGNED) ) , #{seriesCode},#{drama},#{dramaname},#{dramaviewPoint},#{Resolution},#{Definition},#{SourceType}, #{Type},#{duration},#{priority},#{Injectiontime},#{pic},#{title},#{description}, #{zxdispatchurl},#{zxversionlist},#{zxfileurl},#{zxmovieUrl},#{zxversion}, #{hwversionlist},#{hwversion},#{hwmovieUrl},#{hwfileurl},0,now(),#{create_user}, #{hwdispatchurl},#{dramasequence},#{isCollectfees},#{collectfeesbag})
